name: Checkbox.Input

value.description: Unless a value is provided, the input's value will be a boolean that represents the checkbox's checked state. Indeterminate checkboxes will have a value of false.
value.description_zh: 除非提供值，否则输入的值将是一个布尔值，表示复选框的选中状态。不确定复选框的值为 false。

disabled.description: Whether or not the checkbox input is disabled. If not provided, it will inherit the disabled state of the Root component, which defaults to false.
disabled.description_zh: 复选框输入是否被禁用。如果未提供，它将继承 Root 组件的禁用状态，默认为 false。

description: The hidden input element that is used to store the checkbox's state for form submission. It receives all the same props as a regular HTML input element.
